message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. It's a great deal and I'm confident you'll find it valuable. Let me know what you think!
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate it, I'm not quite ready to pay $11,000.  I'm willing to go up to $10,500 for the product, given its value to me.  Let me know what you think.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,500 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $10,750. This price is still a good deal for both of us. Let's make this happen!
